titleStmt.title: ¶Faultes escaped in the printing of this treatise gentle reader cor∣rect as followeth.

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: ¶Faultes escaped in the printing of this treatise gentle reader cor∣rect as followeth.

monogr.title: A learned and fruitefull commentarie vpon the Epistle of Iames the Apostle : vvherein are diligently and profitably entreated all such matters and chiefe common places of religion as are touched in the same epistle: written in Latine by the learned clerke Nicholas Hemminge, professour of diuinitie in the Vniuersitie of Hafnie, and nevvly translated into English by VV.G
monogr.author: Hemmingsen, Niels

div.head: ¶Faultes escaped in the printing of this treatise gentle reader correct as followeth.
div.p: Fol. 17. pag. 2. lin. 5. for tabernanacle, reade, tabernacle.
Fol. 55. pag. 1. lin. 11.14.16. Passe ouer this worde (part) as being superfluous.
Fol. 62. pag. 2. lin. 21. for dutie, reade, benefite.
